name: Transforester
description:
A game made for the unreal engine 2018 spring game jam. The game was made by Ronja, Saara and Vilma.

Gameplay Instructions
Controls:
FPS camera controlled with Mouse + WASD and space to jump.
Left mouse click fires a projectile that breaks items.
Right mouse click fires a projectile that restores items. 

What to do: 
Solve the puzzles using the break and restore ability to make it to the final level.
